price: ទ្រង់មិនត្រូវគេសួរដេញដោលនូវអ្វីដែលទ្រង់ធ្វើនោះ ឡើយ តែពួកគេទេដែលត្រូវគេ(អល់ឡោះ)សួរដេញដោលនោះ។
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
